sense.gloss: to branch, to fork, to diverge
to separate, to split, to divide
the public, the street (e.g. "word on the street")
location (e.g. of a battle), scene (e.g. of carnage)
Sanuki (former province located in present-day Kagawa Prefecture)
Iki (former province located on Iki Island in present-day Nagasaki Prefecture)
Oki (former province located on Oki Island in present-day Shimane Prefecture)

sdata.j: ↑講演↑↓こうえん↓の↑内容↑↓ないよう↓は↑多岐↑↓たき↓に↑渡↑↓わた↓っていた。
sdata.e: The lecture covered a lot of ground.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちは↑岐阜↑↓ぎふ↓に↑行↑↓い↓った。
↑川↑↓かわ↓は↑町↑↓まち↓の３キロ↑下流↑↓かりゅう↓で↑分岐↑↓ぶんき↓する。
sdata.e: The river branches three kilometers below the town.

sdata.j: ↑話↑↓はなし↓は↑多岐↑↓たき↓にわたった。
↑後↑↓あと↓↑数↑↓すう↓↑秒↑↓びょう↓で↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑絶望↑↓ぜつぼう↓の↑分岐↑↓ぶんき↓↑点↑↓てん↓を↑越↑↓こ↓えるのだ。
sdata.e: In a few seconds I would have overcome the desperation threshold.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は、↑人生↑↓じんせい↓の↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓な↑岐路↑↓きろ↓に↑立↑↓た↓っていた。
sdata.e: He came to an important juncture in his life.

sdata.j: ↑岐阜↑↓ぎふ↓↑県↑↓けん↓の↑県庁↑↓けんちょう↓↑所在地↑↓しょざいち↓は↑岐阜↑↓ぎふ↓↑市↑↓し↓です。
sdata.e: Gifu Prefecture's capital is Gifu City.

words.gloss: to branch, to fork, to diverge
